name: Vampire Doctor
description:
The goal of the game is to find the cure for the diseased blood. Do that by researching and reading in the book. You can flip the pages with left click. Use test subjects to find out the cause of the sickness. 

Be aware of the days, certain actions cause the days to pass. You only have 7!

Made for Mini Jam 118: Vampires

Programming, graphics and audio by APirateHat
